SELECT
FROM gprs_config_info WHERE gprs_id IN #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select gprs.* ,type.type_name as deviceTypeStr, balance.para1, balance.para2, balance.para3, balance.para4, balance.para5, balance.para6, balance.para7 from gprs_config_info as gprs left join version_and_balance_info as balance on gprs.gprs_id=balance.gprs_id left join gprs_device_type as type on type.type_code = gprs.device_type where gprs.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

mapper.select: select gprs_id from gprs_config_info where gprs_id not in(select gprs_id from base_station_info) and gprs_id like '%${_parameter}%' and gprs_flag = 0

select gprs_id from gprs_config_info where gprs_id not in(select gprs_id from base_station_info)
and gprs_id like '%${gprsId}%'
and device_type = #{deviceType,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and gprs_flag =1

select
from gprs_config_info where rcv_time is not null
